targets.query:
from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "e_day")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * ${PRICE_PER_KW}}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * ${CURRENCY}}))

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  value AS "outside temperature"
FROM meteo
where type = "outside_temp"

targets.query:
from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "e_total")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * $PRICE_PER_KW}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * ${CURRENCY}}))

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  id
FROM elektro
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.description:
Negative value = Buying from grid</br>
Positive value = Sending to grid
panels.title: Power from Grid

matcher.options: Battery State of Charge battery_soc FVE

targets.query:
from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "load_p1")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Load L1 (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "load_p2")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Load L2 (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "load_p3")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Load L3 (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active_power1")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Active Power L1 (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active_power2")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Active Power L2 (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active_power3")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Active Power L3 (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pbattery1")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Battery Total (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ppv")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Generated power (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "e_load_day")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Load (W)" }))

from(bucket: "FVE_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "e_day")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Generated power (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "load_ptotal")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Load (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "active_power_total" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Meter - Grid (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>r._field == "pbattery1")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Battery (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ppv" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"PV -Generating power (W)" }))

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_soc")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Batter State of Charge (SOC) (%)" }))
